article_text:
UNITED NATIONS—The messages from world leaders and celebrities gathered here this weekend centered on an ambitious idea: Nations need to tackle 17 goals, including eradicating poverty and controlling climate change, to sustain a better future for the planet and its population.

The cost is $3 trillion and the deadline 2030.

The U.N.’s Sustainable Development Summit kicked off on Friday with 154 countries attending and opening...

twitter.description: At the U.N.’s Sustainable Development Summit, world leaders including President Barack Obama discussed how to reach development goals that will cost $3 trillion to achieve and are to be reached by a deadline of 2030.
twitter.title: World Leaders Tackle Development Goals

image.alt: World leaders tackle costly and thorny development goals at U.N. summit

The U.N.’s Sustainable Development Summit kicked off on Friday with 154 countries attending and opening...
UNITED NATIONS—The messages from world leaders and celebrities gathered here this weekend centered on an ambitious idea: Nations need to tackle 17 goals, including eradicating poverty and controlling climate change, to sustain a better future for the planet and its population.
